strapiPost.title: Breeze Air Lands at XNA
strapiPost.content:
Breeze Airways, started by JetBlue's founder, takes off from XNA on June 17, offering nonstop flights to Tampa, quickly followed by two more nonstop routes from XNA to New Orleans and San Antonio, starting July 15.

  • Tell me more: These nonstop destinations from XNA are part of Breeze Airways' newly announced national flight network. The Breeze flights out of XNA will run every Thursday, Friday, Sunday and Monday.
  • Fun fact: Only 11% of the seats sold at XNA were offered by a low-cost carrier in May 2019. All those seats were sold by Allegiant Air, the airportâ€™s only low-cost carrier at the time.

You can read more about the company, Breeze Airways, HERE.
